Reviews.Title: “A well located hotel in a very pretty area.”
Reviews.Author: Emma D
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights hotel april 2012 whilst explored various venice offer overall pleasant hotel basics possibly location island lido perfect getting hussle bussle venice youre 29 age highly recommend buying rolling venice card 4 euros entitles discount boat transport passes paid 18euros unlimited boat travel 72 hours instead 32euros pass lots discounts main attractions specific restaurants hotel approximately 1 hour boat ride marco polo airport costs return trip beware waiting alilaguna boat airport local italians priority havent waited boat dissapointments hotel walls extremely thin hear word neighbouring guests beds hard shower curtain baths probably wiser decision decor little

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, a little dated, but good location and staff”

Reviews.Content: enjoyed 2 wonderful nights 5 minute walk ferry venice lido wonderful quiet night own little shopping nearby amazing gelato restaurants front porch relax afternoon photo

Reviews.Title: “nice but boring”

Reviews.Content: bad start arrived found company booked hotel connect gone bust meant pay manager deal claim money hotel 15mins walk boat terminals handy happens hotel seen sit drink dont snacks breakfast everyday eating venice expensive matter supermarkets reasonable 5 days 3 hotel getting sightseeing dont stay bored

Reviews.Title: “Nicest people and great service - An Oasis in a town of unfriendliness.”

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights kids nice actually suite 3 staff extremely nice helpful luggage cabs oasis rude unfriendly venetians
